00041 typedef struct {
00042         size_t ord; 
00043         void *data; 
00044 } T_deck_card;
00045 
00050 typedef struct {
00051         unsigned int seed;      
00052         size_t size;            
00053         size_t dealt;           
00054         T_deck_card *cards;     
00055 } T_deck;
